channel.title: Posts on Don't Let Me Down
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Don't Let Me Down

item.title: nginx笔记
item.description: mac下nginx的下载安装和使用 使用brew安装 安装 brew install nginx 检查nginx配置信息 brew info nginx 安装的文件路径 配置文件：/opt/homebrew/etc/nginx/nginx.conf 默认服务器地址：/opt/homebrew/var/www 安装路径：/opt/homebrew/Cellar/nginx/1.23.3 配置文件nginx.conf # 进程数（与核相关） worker_processes 1; # pid pid /opt/homebrew/etc/nginx/logs/nginx.pid; # 允许连接数 events { worker_connections 1024; } # http配置部分 http { # 引入配置文件与返回类型 include mime.types; default_type application/octet-stream; # 超时时间 keepalive_timeout 65; # server部分 server { # 端口号 listen 8080; # 服务器地址 server_name 0.0.0.0; # 路由 location / { # 项目根目录 root /Users/kimi/Documents/GitHub/generate-visualization/backend/dist; # index index index.html index.htm; } # ——————————————————————————也可写成———————————————————————————————————— #root /Users/kimi/Documents/GitHub/generate-visualization/backend/; #location /dist { # root /Users/kimi/Documents/GitHub/generate-visualization/backend/dist; # index index.

item.title: 关于blog的一些操作方法
item.description: 关于配置文件 参考https://www.sulvblog.cn/posts/blog/build_hugo/ 参考https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod 关于发布文章 cd ~/blog hugo new posts/xxx.md 编辑md保存 hugo (hugo server -D查看draft，hugo server) cd public git add . git commit -m “update blog” git push origin main
